articles.title: Lifesaving oxygen aid arrives in India as death toll hits new record - News24
articles.description: More emergency medical aid from foreign donors to alleviate a dire oxygen shortage arrived in India on Sunday, as Covid-19 deaths in the South Asian nation rose to a new record.
